Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes the widow of Howard Mahler to file a retirement option election on behalf of her deceased husband
Summary: Authorizes Robin Garfinkle, the widow of Howard Mahler, to file a retirement option election on behalf of her deceased husband.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the widow of Howard Mahler to file a retirement option election form
